trans-unit.source: Disclaimer:Basilisp is a project I created to learn about Python, Clojure, and hosted languages generally. It should not be used in a production setting.
trans-unit.target: 免责声明：Basilisp是我创建的一个项目，旨在学习Python，Clojure和托管语言。不应在生产环境中使用它。

trans-unit.source: A Clojure-like lisp written for Python
trans-unit.target: 一个为Python编写的类似Clojure的lisp。

trans-unit.source: A Lisp dialect inspired by Clojure targeting Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 一个受Clojure启发的针对Python 3的Lisp方言。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, pyenv is recommended to manage versions of Python readily on your local development environment. Setup of pyenv is somewhat more specific to your environment, so see the documentation in the repository for more information.
trans-unit.target: 此外，建议您在本地开发环境中使用 pyenv 轻松管理Python版本。 pyenv 的设置在某种程度上更特定于您的环境，因此请参阅存储库中的文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Afterwards, you can start up the REPL for development with a simple:
trans-unit.target: 之后,你可以通过简单的启动REPL进行开发。

trans-unit.source: Basilisp documentation can help guide your exploration at the REPL. Additionally, Basilisp features many of the same functions and idioms as Clojure so you may find guides and documentation there helpful for getting started.
trans-unit.target: Basilisp 文档可帮助指导您在REPL进行探索。另外，Basilisp具有许多与Clojure相同的功能和习惯用法，因此您可能会在其中找到有助于入门的指南和文档。
Basilisp使用Tox自动化整理，运行测试和类型检查 。这三个步骤都可以使用一个简单的 make 目标执行：

trans-unit.source: Basilisp is developed on GitHub and hosted on PyPI. You can fetch Basilisp using a simple:
trans-unit.target: Basilisp在GitHub上开发， 并在PyPI 上托管。您可以使用以下简单方法获取Basilisp：

trans-unit.source: Developing on Basilisp
trans-unit.target: 在Basilisp上发展

trans-unit.source: Eclipse Public License 1.0
trans-unit.target: Eclipse Public License 1.0

trans-unit.source: Getting Started
trans-unit.target: 入门

trans-unit.source: If dependencies are added or changed afterwards, you may need to make setup-dev again before attempting to start the REPL again or run tests.
trans-unit.target: 如果之后添加或更改了依赖项，则可能需要在 再次尝试启动REPL或运行测试之前再次 make setup-dev 。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Linting, Running Tests, and Type Checking
trans-unit.target: 绒毛、运行测试和类型检查。

trans-unit.source: Once Basilisp is installed, you can enter into the REPL using:
trans-unit.target: 安装Basilisp后,您可以使用REPL进入。

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: Testing is performed using PyTest. Type checking is performed by MyPy. Linting is performed using Prospector.
trans-unit.target: 使用PyTest执行测试。类型检查由MyPy执行。使用Prospector执行整理。

trans-unit.source: This project uses pipenv to manage the Python virtual environment and project dependencies. pipenv can be installed using Homebrew (on OS X) or pip otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 该项目使用 pipenv 来管理Python虚拟环境和项目依赖项。 可以使用Homebrew（在OS X上）或通过 pip 来安装 pipenv ：

trans-unit.source: To prepare your pipenv environment, you need to install dependencies and install Basilisp as an editable dependency:
trans-unit.target: 要准备 pipenv 环境，您需要安装依赖项并将Basilisp安装为可编辑的依赖项：

trans-unit.source: 🐍 basilisp 🐍
trans-unit.target: 🐍basilisp🐍
